description: In the clutches of the Ryotian Empire, our heroes soon discover that the lines between allies and enemies are not as clear-cut as they believe. Held captive inside an enormous underground city, they must plan a way to escape the Aethril mines, and convince others to resume the fight to save Warlands from utter ecological disaster. Meanwhile, Zeph encounters an old enemy as he tries to find a way to free his companions and escape the most heavily fortified city on the continent. Also included in this issue is a special five page flipbook of the upcoming Warlands title 'Banished Knights', which tells the dark tale of the aftermath of the Darklyte Crusade, told from the perspective of it's losers, the scattered remnants of the Vampire Horde of Datara.
name: Aragon

description: The Werewolf plague only gets worse as Razor is kept out of the action from her injuries from the last clash she had with them.

On the run from the Ryotian Empire, Zeph finds himself in the company of Aragorn, an unscrupulous sorcerer from Zeph's past who insists he knows a way to reverse the endless winter that is threatening Warlands. Zeph grudgingly agrees to a dubious truce with a former enemy as he and his companions are pursued by an elite band of Ryotian soldiers.
name: Uprising

description: Megan is the first of her kind, born upon the mythical island of Avalon. The daughter of a legendary king, she craves adventure, excitement and an escape from the "perfect" world in which she lives. When her father, also consumed by a quest for adventure, disappears, Megan decides to follow him. Her escape is presented to her in the form of the mists that surround the island, mists that are gateways to other worlds and dimensions. Armed with her father's recently recovered sword, Megan gathers her courage and enters the mist.
name: Wanderlust part 1

description: Having left the relative safety of the her homeland-the mythical island of Avalon-in search of her father, King Arthur, Megan finds herself in a land unlike anything she ever imagined. Now, accompanied by her new dwarf companion, Jerome, she will traverse cities that float upon the air, meet magical creatures and face fire-breathing dragons!
name: Wanderlust part 2

description: As Megan and Jerome fight off the reptilian guardians of the Tower of the Two Dragons, they discover that they are not the only wanderers on the island of Lamiam who have an interest in the secrets within the Tower. And what clues does Megan find in the pursuit of her lost father, the legendary King Arthur?

Safely away from the Ryotian mines, Aragorn reveals a plan to Zeph and his companions that he believes will result in the complete restoration of Warland's ecosystem. Unfortunately, it's going to take every ounce of magic Zeph has at his command to accomplish his goal, but in doing so, he may very well doom himself to a fate worse than death, as the use of their magic is the very thing that will allow the nameless ones to find them...
name: Gathering Storm

description: Aragon's mysterious plan reaches near its climax forcing Zeph to confront the demons from their past. Unanswered questions from the story of Warlands Volume 1 are revealed amidst a deadly battle whose cost of victory may be one Zeph will be unwilling to pay.

Narrowly escaping death at the hands of Aragon's betrayal, our heroes find themselves pitted against an army of Demons that have allied themselves with Aragon and his newfound power. Hopelessly outnumbered, our heroes must find a way to defeat their powerful new enemies before they can turn Warlands from a frozen wasteland into a burning Hell on earth.

Tricking Zeph and his cohorts into following him back in time, Aragon sets his sights on destroying Warlands by setting the entire planet aflame! With the armies of both Ryotia and the Astral Plane standing in their way, Zeph and his companions must find a way to stop Aragon's mad plan. But by stopping Aragon will our heroes lose the one chance they have to save Warland's fragile ecosystem forever? And how will a stolen artifact of unimaginable power effect the outcome?

Despite double-crossing our heroes from the beginning, the half-man half-demon Aragon is planning on keeping one of his promises: He's got a plan to save Warlands' frozen ecosystem. And to do it, he's going to use the power of the astral plane to burn all life from the face of the planet, and re-create Warlands in his own image. Zeph and his companions begin a final battle to save all life as we know it in the most climactic battle ever in the Warlands series.

The battle for freedom continues in this essential WARLANDS: AGE OF ICE attachment story. The heartless Ryotians continue to hoard the natural resources necessary for survival in frozen-over Warlands. Yet still the peasant rebel armies continue to fight. As is revealed in this issue, somewhere in Warlands, in a location known only by the rebels, a small peasant village is secretly manufacturing weapons for the rebel cause. The Ryotians will stop at nothing to discover the whereabouts of that village and have hired a merciless enforcer to get this information, by any means necessary. Who is this mysterious enforcer? Will the rebels be strong enough to resist him? WARLANDS: AGE OF ICE #0 will begin to answer these vital questions.

Collecting the rare and much-sought after Warlands Vol. 1, Wizard #1/2, Another Universe #0, an all-new Epilogue story and an all-new framing sequence. Plus a complete cover gallery of the above including all the variants. Enjoy an evening by the fireside in the land of magic and vampires. Experience first hand three tales that forever changed the balance between might and right in the world of Warlands. In WARLANDS SPECIAL: THREE STORIES readers will discover two early self-contained tales from the Warlands Universe as well as the beginnings of Warlands Ice Age all in one place. This special graphic album provides the perfect opportunity to sample the past, present, and future of Warlands all in one beautiful, accessible package.

From the snow covered mountains in Warlands' frigid north, to the world's storm-tossed southern seas, a band of heroes struggles to come together to face the planet's greatest threat, the dark soul of Warlands itself. Threatened by the rise of these diverse heroes, this evil force summons a rag-tag army of those inclined toward darkness to its defense. If Warlands is to be exorcized of its ever-present spectre of war and death, our heroes must embark on a quest toward the light, surviving the attacks of a berserk barbarian army, and an ever-stranger array of fierce, unstoppable, supernatural monsters.

The heroes are finally united, and the enemy is identified, but how can the dark and powerful entity behind Warland's constant climate of horror and destruction be found, let alone defeated? Only a strong sense of purpose, and one vague clue ("Seek the answer at the world's highest point..."), leads them onward. Additionally, though they share a mission, the heroes must bond despite often-wild disparities in their personalities, passions and methods. Even as the heroes flounder on the first steps of their quest to free their world from darkness, a vast, unstoppable army of evil mobilizes to stop them, and their cause, forever! Meanwhile, will flirtation turn to romance amongst the heroic band... or split them apart before they start?
name: To Name The Enemy

description: Have the heroes found the tomb of Warlands' greatest hero, the mystic sage known as Luzien? How will this discovery help the heroes defeat the all-pervasive evil force that corrupts their world?

The army of darkness have hunted down the champions of light. Now slaughter is at hand. But the lost secrets of Warlands' greatest hero may turn the tide. In the end, it comes down to the bravery and intelligence of Laina.

A new quest begins. New heroes and villains arrive on the scene. A threat to the whole of Warlands is launched from the world's dark heart itself. The fabled exploits of the Banished Knights are now a dim memory, but the freezing future of the Age of Ice is still to come. A new band of heroes goes in search of the power that spreads dark conflict across the globe, and the fate of an ancient sage, who may have held the key to a world's survival. Along the way, powerful antagonists, strange allies and bizarre creatures will be encountered. And, don't count the race of vampires out of the equation just yet...
name: Powers and Principalities

description:
Darque uses Razors humanity against her as they battle in the hospital while using her lack of compassion to give her an edge.

The two battle till they end up on the roof of the building as Darque starts to piece more of her memories back together and resolves to pay a visit to Kat next. Razor attacks and is blown back by a psyonic blast from Darque. They battle across the city until they crash into a church and as Darque remembers more of her time in hell Morbid Angel appears and puts his sword to her throat.
name: Razor To Razor!

description: Razor and Darque conclude their battle.
name: Dark Destiny

description:
From the grave of Nicole Mitchell rises a twisted rotting corpse of Razor. Darque Razor finds a little girl in the graveyard and, while zombies rise from the ground around her, Darque slays her to renounce her humanity.

Meanwhile the Razor who was returned to earth minus a soul by The Morbid Angel recalls how her physical body was buried and many this one she has now was crated for her to use on earth, her previous one having a fist sized hole in it from her murder.
name: Dark Birth

description:
Fangs of the Widow was originally published by London Night Studios before being reprinted by Ground Zero Comics some 3 years later.

This issue reprints Widow: Flesh And Blood #1.
name: Flesh & Blood part 1

description: This issue reprints Widow: Flesh and Blood #2.
name: Flesh & Blood part 2

description: This issue reprints Widow: Flesh and Blood #3.
name: Flesh & Blood part 3

description: This issue reprints Widow: Kill Me Again #1.
name: Kill Me Again #1

description: Welcome to COOL WORLD, where men are men...and everybody else is a 'doodle.' Cool World is a world of animated beings and bizarre cartoon lands where anything is possible and everything happens, sooner or later! It's also a summer of 1992 live action and animated film from Paramount Pictures, directed by veteran animator Ralph Bakshi, and starring Kim Basinger, Gabriel Byrne and Brad Pitt. But before seeing the film, you can have an exclusive look at this unique world in DC's COOL WORLD miniseries, a prequel to the film. Frank Harris is the only flesh-and-blood human being on Cool World, living the life of a criminal mastermind. What could possess a hard case like Harris to team up with an animated goofball of a doodle like Nails the Spider? It could only be something like the 'ultimate weapon,' an item possessing the power to wipe out doodle lives...or control all of Cool World!
name: Night of the Living Doodles

description: The race is on to possess the 'ultimate weapon,' which can give the holder power over all of Cool World! Human Frank Harris and 'doodle' Nails are both betrayed by those they trust, and they decide to take the big dive off Suicide Bridge.
name: Breaking Up Is Hard To Do

description: Frank Harris, the human, and Nails, the doodle spider, form an unusual and uneasy alliance as they seek to retrieve the deadly 'ultimate weapon' before it falls into the wrong hands - those of the beautiful but dangerous Holli Would.
name: That's What Friends Are For

description: The life of Nails the Spider hangs in the balance as human Frank Harris competes to save it - on a bizarre television game show. Meanwhile, the doodle mob's battle for possession of the 'ultimate weapon' reaches its exciting conclusion as DC's special prequel miniseries ends, establishing Paramount's film Cool World, directed by Ralph Bakshi.
name: You Bet His Life!

description: A blazing miniseries set in the not-too-distant future begins. A casualty of World War II is revived to join a group of bizarrely transformed soldiers that defend the Earth from other-dimensional threats.
name: A Spear of Silence

description: The blazing miniseries set in the not-too-distant future heats up! Sturna, the Lord of Misrule, has watched dimension after dimension fall beneath his heel, with only one escaping his grasp...Earth. Unfortunately, someone from Earth is willing to supply him with the knowledge he needs to complete his inter-dimensional set of conquests. Can Myrra, one of the Creature Commados on an advance scouting mission, derail this horrific exchange of information? Meanwhile, at Project M, Captain Hunter tries to get Gunner to finally come to terms with his new undead status before all hell breaks loose!
name: From Here To Heaven Is A Scar

description: The blazing miniseries boils over! Heads up, you lowlifes! Troll King, Weapons Master and their ugly, over-stimulated, transdimensional goons have entered Earth's kill zone...right in the heart of Project M's headquarters! Medusa, Wolfpack, Patchwork Man, Vampire, the Gunner, and Captain Hunter are gonna prove once and for all they ain't your daddy's Creature Commandos! It's the biggest, baddest, bloodiest rumble of the year...and we're just warming up! If you ain't there, you can kiss your planet goodbye!
name: Dead Center -- Deep As Death

description: Listen up, because we're only gonna tell you this once! The Creature Commandos of Project M have successfully D-Gated to the primary drop zone on Terra Arcana! Their objective: Take out the warlord Saturna and his allies in the confederated Dimensions. Now this is where the going gets tough. And when the going gets tough, it's time for the tough to kick some interstellar butt. You copy? Then we're good to go. Lock and load!
name: Hide Witch Hide

description: Enter Claw the Unconquered as the hard-hitting miniseries nears its conclusion! On the world called Terra Arcana, the Creature Commandos have infiltrated a nomadic convoy heading straight into the heart of Lord Saturna's desert stronghold! However, a sizable problem presents itself when the caravan is attacked by anti-Saturna rebels led by none other than the legendary, demon-possessed barbarian, Claw the Unconquered! Too much brutal action and other-worldly strangeness for you to take? Shape up! This is the Creature Commandos! Got that? Now get your lily-livered self back into the field!
name: When The Earth Moves Again

description: The monsters who are soldiers are all that stand between Earth and the forces of Saturna as the miniseries nears its explosive conclusion! As demon warriors from another dimension roam the world, can even the world's strangest heroes save all humanity?
name: The Last Wall Of The Castle

description: The Creature Commandos continue their mission on Terra Arcana, piecing together the information on who's providing weapons to Lord Saturna, the bad-ass Confederator of Dimensions. Meanwhile, Velcoro the Vampire and the Gunner have been taken hostage by none other than Claw the Unconquered and his rebel force.
name: The Other Side Of This Life

description: The blockbuster conclusion to the universe-spanning epic! "War Movie" shows the various tribes of Terra Arcana uniting together, led by the stalwart Creature Commandos, to take down and destroy the inter-dimensional menace known as Saturna! What lies ahead for this ragtag team of misfit soldiers?
name: War Movie
